name: F.E.A.R. Game Archive
summary: Data archive format used by F.E.A.R. (First Encounter Assault Recon), a first-person shooter video game; includes game data referenced by the F.E.A.R. and required for the program to run; typically should not be opened manually, but can be modified using a third-party archive tool.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Edit with Arche Noah arch-file tool
